data.eml:eml: Redescription of the milliped Myrmecodesmus mundus (Chamberlin) (Polydesmida: Pyrgodesmidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shelley, Rowland M. (2002): Redescription of the milliped Myrmecodesmus mundus (Chamberlin) (Polydesmida: Pyrgodesmidae). Zootaxa 115: 1-6, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.155975
